title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3345/80 of 23 December 1980 on the recording of the country of consignment in the external trade statistics of the Community and statistics of trade between Member States
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 3345/80 of 23 December 1980 on the recording of the country of consignment in the external trade statistics of the Community and statistics of trade between Member States
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The purpose of this Regulation is to adopt certain specific provisions as provided for in Article 11 of Council Regulation (EEC) No 1736/75.

When goods which have been placed under inward processing arrangements in a Member State are dispatched to another Member State, in the unaltered state or as intermediate or compensating products within the meaning of Directive 69/73/EEC, in accordance with Articles 2 and 3 of Directive 73/95/EEC, the statistical information medium used by the latter Member State to record such goods in its imports shall indicate the Member State of consignment.

When goods or products for which it can be ascertained that they either originated in the Community or having originated in a third country had been previously put in free circulation in the Community are exported to a third country and afterwards imported from a third country into the Community by a Member State, either in the unaltered state or after having been processed or worked on in a way which does not constitute a change of origin under the provisions of Article 5 of Regulation (EEC) No 802/68, the statistical information medium used to record this importation shall indicate the third country of consignment.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1981.
(1) OJ No L 183, 14.7.1975, p. 3.  (2) OJ No L 329, 22.12.1977, p. 3.  (3) OJ No L 58, 8.3.1969, p. 1.  (4) OJ No L 301, 20.11.1975, p. 1.  (5) OJ No L 148, 28.6.1968, p. 1.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 23 December 1980.
For the Commission
